item.title: Dozens of Bob Ross paintings will be auctioned to help public TV after funding cuts
item.description: Thirty of Ross' trademark landscapes will be sold at a series of auctions starting in November. He painted many of them live on The Joy of Painting, which started airing on PBS in the 1980s.
